Danz' drills
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Raising Methods: Danz' drills
By danz on Wednesday, November 14, 2001 - 09:07 pm:

I didnt know where exactly to put this, so here it is: in goat i have discovered a little 3 drill training method that will raise ALL stats but lif. VERY well! now for this to work effectivly you'll need both the holy goblet and the best rock (also probly the aroma pouch (if thats the best scent thingy) anyhoo:

start with a Blowfish, thisll greatly raise spd. raise pow. a bit, and drop int a bit.

follow this with a search. thatll greatly raise int. (making up for the loss) slightly rais spd (keeping it nice and high!) and slightly lower def.

follow with a def. drill (cant remember the name) that greatly raises def, and slightly lowers spd. (no problme cuz you raise it VERY high with the other drills) now the best part of this is that my joker is able to pull off all 3 without needing rest till the fourth week, when i rest he gets FULLY recharged, and the next month i can use nothing but drills to raise his lif.

now i know that this leaves almost no time for tourneys... but i just thought id share my little training method thing. (BTW i just use whatever food has the highest TOTAL value, usually edging for nutrition over favourites)

By torey_luvullo on Thursday, November 15, 2001 - 04:53 am:

when you use this sequence over a lifetime, or even over a life phase, how much total points do you gain? there are a lot of people claiming a lot of statgain for training regimens, and i would like to hear if you documented the exact number of points you gained in this demanding regimen.

BTW im not saying that this is a be all end all method... im just saying what im doing... and i thought it was a pretty neat method so i thought i'd share.
